#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef vector<list<ll> > vli;
typedef vector<ll > vi;
typedef pair<int ,int> pii;
#define F first
#define S second
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair 
#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
#define REP(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;++i)
#define sd(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sld(n) scanf("%ld",&n)
#define sll(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define ss(n) scanf("%s",s)
#define mset(n,k) memset(n,k,sizeof(n))
#define mss multiset<int>
int main(){
    int t,n;
    ll x;
    sd(t);
    while(t--){
        sd(n),sll(x);
        ll cost[n],profit=0;
        rep(i,n){
            sll(cost[i]);
            cost[i]-=x;
        }
        ll sum=0;
        //Kadane's Algorithm
        rep(i,n){
            sum+=cost[i];
            if(sum<0)
                sum=0;
            if(profit<sum)
                profit=sum;

        }
        cout<<profit<<endl;
    }


return 0;}
